definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Stand Up, stand up for Jesus, Ye soldiers of the cross;
sentences.chinese: 兴起兴起为耶稣十架忠勇精兵。

sentences.english: The soe problem is also solving itself through attrition.
sentences.chinese: 国企还正在通过精兵简政来解决自身的问题。

sentences.english: The value of the pound will force British companies to be leaner and fitter .
sentences.chinese: 英镑目前的汇率将迫使英国公司厉行精兵简政。

sentences.english: Persevere in the Party's absolute leadership over the army and take the road of fewer but better troops with Chinese characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 坚持党对军队的绝对领导，走中国特色的精兵之路。

sentences.english: So the year following Lysias gathered together threescore thousand chosen men, and five thousand horsemen, that he might subdue them.
sentences.chinese: 次年，他调集六万精兵，五千骑兵，来攻打犹太人。

sentences.english: Onward, Christian soldiers, marching as to war.
sentences.chinese: 基督精兵前进，齐向战场走。

sentences.english: Thou therefore endure hardness, as a good soldier of Jesus Christ.
sentences.chinese: 你要和我同受苦难，好像基督耶稣的精兵。

sentences.english: God gets his best soldiers out of the highlands of affliction.
sentences.chinese: 神的精兵都是从苦难中得来的。
城堡里布满了诸多斗武士精兵。

definition: strong soldiers/make the military powerful (political slogan)
person willing to sacrifice his life (for a good cause)
